Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute near Ogden/Rockwell
ShortDescription: Westbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, California, and Ogden, due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, California, and Ogden, due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell

Eastbound buses are not affected.  Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152: Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Addison / LeClaire
ShortDescription: Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Cicero, Irving Park, Laramie & Addison due to street blockage near Addison/LeClaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Cicero, Irving Park, Laramie & Addison due to street blockage near Addison/LeClaire.

Eastbound buses are not affected. 

Allow extra travel time.
